text: Mela (Punjabi: ) is a 1986 Pakistani Punjabi language action film, directed by Hassan Askari and produced by Anwar Kamal Pasha, starring actor Sultan Rahi in the lead role and with Anjuman and M. Ajmal as the villain. ==Cast== * Anjuman * Sultan RahiFilm cast of Mela (1986) on Motion Pictures Archive of Pakistan website Retrieved 12 June 2018 * Gori * Zamurrad * Mustafa Qureshi * Ilyas Kashmiri * Ajmal Khan * Bahar * Sawan * Saiqa * Nanha * Anwar Khan * Altaf Khan * Zahir Shah ==Track list== {| class="wikitable" |- ! # !! title: Mela (1986 film)
